constructor(address _ohm, address _sOHM, address _gOHM, uint256 _epochLength, uint256 _firstEpochNumber, uint256 _firstEpochTime, address _authority)
function epoch() view returns (uint256 length, uint256 number, uint256 end, uint256 distribute)
function stake(address _to, uint256 _amount, bool _rebasing, bool _claim) returns (uint256)
function unstake(address _to, uint256 _amount, bool _trigger, bool _rebasing) returns (uint256 amount_)
function warmupInfo(address) view returns (uint256 deposit, uint256 gons, uint256 expiry, bool lock)
